SELECT c.consultNo, c.mid, c.mphone, c.postcode, c.address, c.detailAddress, c.buildingType, c.scheduledDate, c.pyeongsu, c.budget, c.happyCall, c.consultDate, c.status, i.itemNo, i.tiling, i.tilingD, i.flooring, i.flooringD, i.kitchen, i.kitchenD, i.bathroom, i.bathroomD, i.entrance, i.entranceD, i.balcony, i.balconyD, i.lighting, i.lightingD, i.door, i.doorD, i.etc, i.etcD, q.quoNo, q.quoDate, q.constScheduleStart, q.constScheduleEnd, q.constTotal, q.demolTotal, q.total, v.visitNo, v.visitStartDate, v.visitEndDate, v.visitStatus FROM consult c LEFT JOIN item i ON c.consultNo = i.consultNo LEFT JOIN quotation q ON c.consultNo = q.consultNo LEFT JOIN visit v ON c.consultNo = v.consultNo WHERE c.consultNo = #{consultNo}
